titlepage.titleproper: Guide to William Markwick, Danish Plants Found in the British Islescirca 1802
titlepage.author: Finding aid prepared by SCRC

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Markwick, William. Danish Plants Found in the British Isles

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Manuscript copy of text, and pen and ink copies after plates selected from Flora danica (Copenhagen: 1761-99), accompanied by descriptive notes from W. Hudson, Flora anglica (London: 1762). Also includes manuscript of abridged selections from G. Acerbi, Travels through Sweden, Finland, and Lapland to the North Cape in the years 1798 and 1799 (London: 1802).

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Markwick, William, Danish Plants Found in the British Isles, Crerar Ms 139, [Box #, Folder #], Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Manuscript copy of text, and pen and ink copies after plates selected from Flora danica (Copenhagen: 1761-99), accompanied by descriptive notes from W. Hudson, Flora anglica (London: 1762). Also includes manuscript of abridged selections from G. Acerbi, Travels through Sweden, Finland, and Lapland to the North Cape in the years 1798 and 1799 (London: 1802). Copy made by William Markwick. Inscribed in different, 20th century hand [J. Christian Bay?] on flyleaf: "by Wm Markwick of Catsfield, Sussex, c.1780." Gift of J. Christian Bay. Bound in contemporary vellum over boards.
